passives.name: Void Explosion
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy champion creates an explosion at their location after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, dealing {{as|10|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} {{as|(+ 3% of each target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area, capped at 300 against {{tip|monsters}}.
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

effects_structured.raw: Dealing ability damage to a champion triggers a delayed explosion that deals magic damage (10 + 15% AP + 3% target max health), capped at 300 vs monsters.
Excessive minion kills reduce gold earned (diminishing returns).
Active: Consume a charge to place a Stealth Ward (range 600).
Ward charges refill upon visiting the shop.

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
